Text: Hey, thanks great idea, uploading the music from smash. Kathryn Heigel and Catherine McFee are great together. The songs are supposed to be available for free download on Itunes but their website sucks, impossible to find anything. I hope you continue with the rest of the shows. Last night they sang a fantastic song "I got my Raybans on" but I can't find it. Could you upload it? Thanks
Thank you for doing this, another for next 6 episodes please.Although soundtrack out today I think.many many thanks though
